steps.title: Initial Assessment
steps.instructions: Document the current state before maintenance. Take photos of any issues or wear.

steps.title: Disassembly
steps.instructions: Carefully disassemble the component. Document each step with photos.

steps.title: Cleaning and Inspection
steps.instructions: Clean all parts and inspect for wear or damage. Mark any areas of concern.

steps.title: Reassembly
steps.instructions: Reassemble the component. Verify all parts are correctly installed.

steps.title: Final Verification
steps.instructions: Test functionality and document the completed maintenance.
